TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SizeF extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Stores an ordered pair of floating-point numbers, typically the width and height of a rectangle.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The unit for a SizeF structure depends on the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageUnit%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.PageScale%2A> settings for the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is used to draw.
## Examples The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> by using the following members:
- <xref:System.Drawing.SizeF.op_Addition%2A>
- <xref:System.Drawing.PointF.op_Addition%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
- <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>
This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form. To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event. Verify that the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
[!code-cs[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.drawing.sizef_1.cs)] [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.drawing.sizef_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.drawing.sizef_1.vb)]
